CustomField.description: Field used for Next Fiscal year revenue Amount
CustomField.formula:
/* Close Date is next year */ IF( YEAR( CloseDate ) = YEAR(TODAY())+1, (365 - (CloseDate - DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,01,01))) / 365 * Amount,
/* Close Date is this year */ IF( YEAR( CloseDate ) = YEAR(TODAY()), (365-(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,31) - CloseDate)) / 365 * Amount, 0))
CustomField.label: Next Fiscal Amount
